title: A Strange Connection: Episode 231
description:
Anglesey is a beautiful Island off the north coast of wales. Retired lecturer 74 year old Gerald Corrigan and his partner Marie, loved the remote position of their home. They both loved nature, peace and solitude so it really was the perfect spot. Then one night in April 2019, Gerald had problems with the satellite dish and headed outside.

This week on the UK True Crime podcast, I discover just what happened to Gerald Corrigan.
